extracted_playbook.title: Use products in a protected environment
extracted_playbook.description: Ensure products are used in a protected and controlled environment to minimize network impact and ensure they are inaccessible from outside.

extracted_playbook.title: Configure external firewalls
extracted_playbook.description: Use external firewalls to protect the automation system network and separate it from other networks. Block port 4840 via the external firewall and open this port for authenticated access only.

extracted_playbook.title: Implement VPN for remote access
extracted_playbook.description: Use Virtual Private Networks (VPN) tunnels when remote access is required.

extracted_playbook.title: Deploy Intrusion Detection Systems (IDS)
extracted_playbook.description: Use IDS where possible to detect anomalies in the network.

extracted_playbook.title: Activate user administration and password functions
extracted_playbook.description: Activate and use user administration and password functions to enhance security.

extracted_playbook.title: Use encrypted communication links
extracted_playbook.description: Ensure communication links are encrypted to protect data integrity and confidentiality.

extracted_playbook.title: Restrict access to development tools and projects
extracted_playbook.description: Restrict access to development tools, their projects, and the products of the automation system by physical means, operating system functions, etc.

extracted_playbook.title: Protect development tools with virus detection
extracted_playbook.description: Protect the development tool by using the latest virus detection solutions.

extracted_playbook.title: Use certificate-based communication
extracted_playbook.description: Use certificate-based communication via the message security modes Sign or Sign&Encrypt and trust the corresponding client certificates on the machine controller by the OPC-UA server to reduce the risk of exploitation.
